bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Routine Impulse Test for Distribution Transformers
IEEE Recommended Practice for Routine Impulse Test for Distribution Transformers

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: General test procedures for performing routine quality control test that is suitable for high-volume, production line testing. Transformer connections, test methods, circuit configurations, and failure detection methods are addressed. This recommended practice covers liquid-immersed, single-and three-phase distribution transformers.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C57.138-2016 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.138-1998)
